intro:rover:002: On your way somewhere, aren't you? I'm <str:vname>, how 'bout you?
intro:rover:002a: Ah, <str:player>. Always a pleasure to meet a new face.
intro:rover:002b: No way, what are the odds! Holy wow.
intro:rover:002c: Oh, I know another <str:player>. Small world, huh?
intro:rover:003a: STOP SHOUTING! Cheese and rice, I only asked where you were going!
intro:rover:004: Huh. I don't think I've ever been to <str:town> before. What's it like?
intro:rover:005: Oh well. You might want to freshen up a bit.<emote:rovershoulder><delay:50>After all, you did basically just wake up, so you should probably wash some of that sleep out of your eyes.
intro:rover:006: You're looking much better, <str:player>. So... how 'bout a nice game of <rnd:travelgame> to pass the rest of the journey?
